name: Sol Swap
desc: Sol Swap is a mobile application through which users can make transactions and save contact details for future reference. Once a user completes a transaction, they will receive an exclusive NFT airdrop to their wallet..

name: Block Store
desc: blockStore is an online marketplace for buying and selling digital products only leveraging token-gated access. With blockStore, users can interact with content that is protected by non-fungible tokens, or NFTs.

name: Log Chain
desc: LogChain is a decentralized provenance application that tracks the ownership and movement of a product or asset through its life cycle. It records each event or transaction that occurs, creating an immutable record of the history of the product or asset. By using a provenance system that leverages blockchain technology, customers can have confidence that the products they are purchasing are genuine and not counterfeits.

name: Beagle World
desc: Beagle NFT Community Application using Flutter and Solana Blockchain.

name: Buy Me A Matic
desc: An alternative to 'Buy me a candy' built on Polygon with features like creating a profile, buying ENS, sending Matic with a message, and reviewing all transactions.
